announcement.goals.undercover: You don't have a Mood, and Killers will mistake you for their ally.
announcement.goals.conductor: Use the master key to open up every door on the train!
announcement.role.the_insane_damned_para: The Insane Damned Paranoid Killer Of Doom Death Destruction And Waffles
announcement.goals.time_keeper: You can see how much time is left of the round.
announcement.goals.bartender: See players that drink through walls!
announcement.goals.phantom: Turn invisible; but watch out for collisions.
announcement.goals.noisemaker: Alert players of your location upon death.
announcement.goals.voodoo: Choose another player to go down with you.
announcement.goals.recaller: Teleport to anywhere on the train!
announcement.goals.vulture: Eat half of the players' bodies to win!
item.noellesroles.defense_vial.tooltip:
Right click on drink trays to use
Clears all poison applied to trays
Protects anyone who drinks a defensed drink one extra hit of life.
announcement.goals.jester: Get killed by an innocent to win!
announcement.goals.corrupt_cop: Kill everyone to win! While you're alive, neither killers nor passengers can win.
game.win.corrupt_cop: Justice has been served... my way.
announcement.goals.bomber: Plant bombs on players! You cannot buy knife or gun.
item.noellesroles.timed_bomb.tooltip:
Right click on a player to plant
After 10s, bomb starts beeping
Can be passed to other players (3s cooldown)
Explodes after 15s of beeping
announcement.goals.assassin: Use your keen eye to expose players' true identities! Right guess—BANG! Wrong guess—also BANG! (Vigilante's too smart to fool)
screen.assassin.title: Assassin Menu
tip.assassin.guess_correct: Bingo! You saw right through %s—they're down!
tip.assassin.guess_wrong: Oops! %s isn't what you thought... BANG! Overconfidence has its price.
